articles.author: Scott Wilson
articles.title: Amid shut-off woes, a beacon of energy
articles.description: A Native American tribe has insulated itself from California’s blackouts by creating a microgrid utility.
articles.content:
BLUE LAKE, Calif. After months of wildfires, an essential question in a warming, windy California is this: How does the state keep the lights on? A tiny Native American tribe, settled here in the Mad River Valley, has an answer.
Build your own utility.
The … [+13274 chars]

articles.title: Chelsea denied by overhead kick; Arsenal beats Man United
articles.description: Alireza Jahanbakhsh’s overhead kick gave Brighton a 1-1 draw against Chelsea in a contender for goal of the season
articles.content:

With an acrobatic overhead kick, the Brighton forward stunned not just Chelsea but his own team, too.
